text: Kwavija waja wose wogendelela kugatamanila Malagizo ga Musa kuwatenda watogoligwe na Mulungu wa muna indukumiza, kwavija yandikigwa Mzinyandiko Zing'alile, “Munhu yoyose yalekile kuzigoga na kuziwinza mbuli zose zandikigwe mkitabu cha Malagizo ga Musa kodukumizwa na Mulungu.”3:10 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 27:26.
